name: 70s Zine
author: Polyducks
description:
A collection of colours used in early print media; sampled from various examples here: http://oa.letterformarchive.org/The
 colours mostly rely on a black/red/orange/white scheme, but I brewed up
 companion cyan-greens which bridge across the blues/yellows.For best results, use in big, punchy blocks.
